data.actual_result: No results found text occasionally flashes behind the magnifying glass
data.expected_result: No results found text doesn't flash behind the magnifying glass
data.short_description: Repeatedly opening/closing the keyboard on the no results screen when inviting members occasionally flashes the "no results" text behind the magnifying glass
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server where you have invite perms - Select the "Invite Members" button - Type some text so you have no results - Repeatedly close and open the keyboard, observing the magnifying glass
